meanings.definition: To include as a necessary part or result.
meanings.sent1: Cooking involves following a recipe step by step.
meanings.sent2: Being a doctor involves helping sick people get better.
meanings.sent3: Playing hide and seek involves finding the best hiding spot.
meanings.sent4: Solving a puzzle involves putting all the pieces together.
meanings.sent5: Learning a new language involves practice and patience.

meanings.sent1: Team sports involve working together towards a common goal.
meanings.sent2: Volunteering involves giving your time to help others in need.
meanings.sent3: Dancing involves moving to the rhythm of the music.
meanings.sent4: Attending a meeting involves listening and sharing ideas.
meanings.sent5: Traveling involves exploring new places and cultures.
